live_updates: We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
29066.summary: Some customers in Calgary (Coventry Hills) are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
29066.title: Nov 14 - Calgary (Coventry Hills) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
